name: MeetCute
description:
MeetCute is a visual novel about finding magic in unexpected places. After a shocking heartbreak, you'll need to decide if you're going to give up on love. As you go through your weekend activities, you'll meet available cuties and have the chance to impress them with your wit and charisma. Will you rediscover your belief in love? Or will you die alone?​ The choice is yours.

Playtime is ~ 30 minutes with multiple endings.

Languages: English

--

story/code/art: emuemw
